adventure_overview: The most popular events in Cub Scouting are found in this Adventure, the Pinewood Derby® and the Raingutter Regatta™. Tigers and adult partners work together to build and race either a car or boat. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: With your Tiger adult partner, assemble and decorate either a Pinewood Derby® car or a Raingutter Regatta™ boat.

activities.name: Raingutter Regatta™ Boat Build Day Tiger
activities.description: Den or pack provides a build day for Cub Scouts.

requirements.text: Learn the rules of the race for the vehicle chosen in requirement 1.

requirements.text: Before the race, discuss with your Tiger adult partner how you will demonstrate good sportsmanship during the race.

activities.name: Act Like a Good Sport Tiger
activities.description: Cub Scouts will act out through roll playing how to be a good sport during the race

requirements.text: With your Tiger adult partner, participate in a Pinewood Derby® or a Raingutter Regatta™.
